```{r load libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(pastecs)

```

```{r load data}
texts = read.csv('TextMessages.csv')

```

```{r}
texts$Group <- as.factor(texts$Group)

texts_long <- pivot_longer(texts,
                           cols = c(Baseline, Six_months),
                           names_to = 'time',
                           values_to = 'text_count')
```

```{r plot 1}

```

```{r plot 2}
# Creates stratified bar charts of text messages Group and Time (Hint: Faceted Bar Charts).
baseline_barchart <- ggplot(texts_long, aes(x=time, y=text_count)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "summary", fun = "sum", fill ='lightblue',color='black') +
  labs(title='Text totals by Group and Time', y='Total Texts', x='Time') +
  theme_minimal() +
  facet_wrap(~Group)

baseline_barchart
```
